import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Sidebar.css'; const username = localStorage.getItem('username') const Sidebar = ({ onLogout }) => { return (
  • Dashboard
  • Billboards
  • Orders
  • Reservations
  • Users

Logged in as: {username}

); }; export default Sidebar;
